on reading compounds: 問責【モンセキ】blame, censure, reproof, reprimand, rebuke
設問【セツモン】posing a question, question
kun reading compounds: 問う【とう】to ask, to inquire, to blame (someone) for, to accuse of, to pursue (question of responsibility), to charge with, to care about, to regard as important, to call into question, to doubt, to question
問うに落ちず語るに落ちる【とうにおちずかたるにおちる】to keep a secret when asked about it, but let it slip inadvertently when chatting on another occasion
問い合わせ【といあわせ】enquiry, inquiry, query, interrogation, ENQ
問屋【とんや】wholesale store, wholesale dealer, wholesaler
